comments.content: That appears to be [Cory Maylett’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051637/http:/maylett.net/portfolio/index.html?10.html) Faktos (from the scrolling portfolio images at the top, click the graphic of a lone ’A’).
Thanks, Mike. I would never have found that.
